thread.title: More chemical attacks will not be tolerated: Pence

title: More chemical attacks will not be tolerated: Pence
text:
More chemical attacks will not be tolerated: Pence 3:50am EDT - 01:09 
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence has echoed warnings to Syria on its alleged use of chemical weapons, also saying he thought a re-negotiated NAFTA deal was only weeks away at the end of the Summit of the Americas in Lima, Peru. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence has echoed warnings to Syria on its alleged use of chemical weapons, also saying he thought a re-negotiated NAFTA deal was only weeks away at the end of the Summit of the Americas in Lima, Peru.
